Question: Hangzhou Meari Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hangzhou Meari Technology Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Support 4G LTE/3G GSM
- Color night vision
- Rechargeable batteries
- Solar panel power support
- PIR human detection
- IP65 weatherproof
- SD card (max. 128GB) / Cloud storage
- Dual-band connection
- Display on both mobile and monitor screen
- Motion/noise/crying detection
- Feeder reminder
- Temperature & humidity detection
- 5200mAh rechargeable batteries
- Two-way audio
- 100% wire-free
- 8-ch PoE NVR with H.265 compression technology
- AI technology for real threat focus
- WebRTC Cloud Platform integration
Summary_cn:
杭州美信科技有限公司。

CES 2024 产品亮点：

- 支持4G LTE/3G GSM
- 彩色夜视功能
- 可充电电池
- 太阳能电池板支持
- PIR人体检测
- IP65级防水
- SD卡（最大128GB）/云存储
- 双频连接
- 在移动设备和监视器屏幕上显示
- 运动/噪音/哭声检测
- 喂食提醒
- 温度和湿度检测
- 5200mAh可充电电池
- 双向语音
- 100%无线
- 8通道PoE NVR，采用H.265压缩技术
- AI技术用于实时威胁聚焦
- WebRTC云平台集成
